amendment.description: To facilitate the sale of United States agricultural products to Cuba, as authorized by the Trade Sanctions Reform and Export Enhancement Act of 2000.

action.text: Amendment SA 281 proposed by Senator Baucus. (consideration: CR S3186) To facilitate the sale of United States agricultural products to Cuba, as authorized by the Trade Sanctions Reform and Export Enhancement Act of 2000.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 281 proposed by Senator Baucus.
